member.name: T:Artikel_Import.src.Backend.Objects.Discount
member.summary: s are being used to apply a discount on a price in a row depending on which discountKey is in a different column in that row. This way different discount can be applied on the same upload. All discount also get saved into , in order to make them visible in eNVenta and not just fill in the already calculated price. The discount can be edited in the .
